headerDisplay: The **Homebridge Meross** plugin allows you to control your Meross Devices from HomeKit. To get started setup your config below. If the device you are trying to setup is not listed below, please request support on our [project page](https://github.com/donavanbecker/homebridge-meross/issues). For information regarding your MessageID, timestamp, and sign please refer to the [Wiki](https://github.com/donavanbecker/homebridge-meross/wiki).
footerDisplay: Please raise any issues on our [project page](https://github.com/donavanbecker/homebridge-meross/issues).

name.title: Name
name.description: The name for the device to be shown in the Home App. This can be changed within the Home App later.

deviceUrl.title: IP Address
deviceUrl.description: The device's IP address. It is recommended to set a static IP for the device.

channel.title: Device Channel
channel.description: Used to map outlets on a Power Strip. Leave as 0 if your device is not a Power Strip. If you are configuring a Power Strip, treat each outlet as its own accessory. Each outlet on the strip must be added as a new accessory and provided a different channel number, typically 0 - 4.
